text: Martín Erasto Torrijos Espino (; born July 18, 1963) is a Panamanian politician. He was 35th President of Panama from September 1, 2004 to June 30, 2009. His father was Omar Torrijos, who was the Military Leader of Panama from 1968 to 1981. ==References== Category:1963 births Category:Living people Category:Presidents of Panama
title: Martín Torrijos
